name: Introductory biology
description: Introduction to the field of biology, including the scientific method, basic cell biology, and genetics.

name: Introductory ecology
description: Introduction to the field of ecology, including principles of ecology, ecosystems, and population dynamics.

name: Evolutionary biology
description: Introduction to the field of evolutionary biology, including evolutionary processes, adaptation, and phylogenetics.

name: Behavioral ecology
description: Introduction to the field of behavioral ecology, including animal behavior, social behavior, and communication.

name: Community ecology
description: Introduction to the field of community ecology, including species interactions, species diversity, and ecosystem structure and function.

name: Conservation biology
description: Introduction to the field of conservation biology, including the principles of conservation, population management, and sustainability.
